sentences.sentence: I think all I ask now, is that the mangel-wurzel is not allowed to die out.
sentences.translation: 我想我现在所要求的，就是不能让 mangel-wurzel 这种甜菜消失。

sentences.sentence: My Farmers' Cyclopedia of 1912 tells me that mangel-wurzel means, roughly translated from German, "root of scarcity".
sentences.translation: 我的《1912年的农民百科全书》告诉我，“mangel-wurzel”从德语粗略翻译过来的意思是“稀缺的根源”。
